biotools.summary:
Phenotype-informed tissue weighting improves prediction of pathogenic noncoding variants.

PINES (Phenotype-Informed Noncoding Element Scoring).

Functional characterization of the noncoding genome is essential for the biological understanding of gene regulation and disease.
